url.description: A full http URL to browse this object in the CRM

objectId.description: The CRM unique ID for the object

isDeleted.description: (Default: false) When true, the object is deleted from the database

phoneNumber.description: The lead's phone number. Used to associated telephony system calls to a lead based on the call participant's phone number.

emailAddress.description: The lead's email address. Used to associate activities to a lead, based on the participants email.

modifiedDate.description: The date and time the object was last modified in the CRM. ISO-8601 datetime format, without milliseconds.

convertedToDealId.description: The deal ID in the CRM. Relevant if the lead is converted to a deal

convertedToAccountId.description: The account ID in the CRM the lead was converted to. Relevant if the lead is converted to an account

convertedToContactId.description: The contact ID in the CRM the lead was converted to. Relevant if the lead is converted to a contact
